english.segment1: Pain is a forest we all get lost in. Between the branches hope can be so hard to see. And In the darkness, weve all got questions. Were all just trying to make sense out of suffering, but
english.segment2: You say I am blessed because of this. So, I choose to believe. As I carry this cross. Youll carry me (Help me believe it)
english.segment3: Fear is a current we all get caught in. And in its motion faith can be so hard to find. And we all falter, cause were all broken. Were all just trying to turn the shadows into light, but
english.segment4: You get glory in the midst of this. And Youre walking with me, and
english.segment5: I know Your promises are faithful. And God, Ive seen Your goodness in my life. And oh, Ive found Your mercy is a river. Your love is an ocean wide
english.segment6: You carry me God. You carry me
